title: Great gifts for logophiles
subtitle: What to give the word lovers in your life
body:
Christmas is a magical time of year, if you forget about the stress of buying gifts, cooking an entire bird in the oven and having those awkward conversations with family members you see just once a year. 

If there’s a logophile in your life, check out these excellent Christmas/birthday/general celebration gift ideas. 

## 1. Scrabble & anything Scrabble related 
Almost every word nerd’s favourite game, Scrabble is the classic logophile contest. But it doesn't stop there. You can get Scrabble-themed 
dictionary, mugs, jewellery etc)

## 2. Bananagrams

## 3. Anything by Mark Forsyth 
One of our favourite authors, Mark Forsyth is the ultimate word nerd and a serious word expert. 

## 4. A Moleskine notepad

## 5.
